namespace = steppe
namespace = Horde_Collapse
namespace = flavor_chu
namespace = horde_events
namespace = flavor_ggk
namespace = horde_mechanic_events
namespace = timur
namespace = moghul
country_event = { 
	id = steppe.1
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = EVT_AI
		steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
		arabian_steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
		saharan_steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.1
	title = "Horde_Collapse.1.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.1.d"
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.1.a"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					tag = CHG
				}
			}
			kill_ruler = yes
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = WHI
				exists = KHI
			}
			KHI = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.36
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = CHU
				CHU = { 
					junior_union_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			break_union = CHU
			log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[CHU.GetName]:broke union with [Root.GetName] during tribal disunity:Horde_Collapse.1"
			CHU = { 
				free_vassal = ARM
				log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:released [ARM.GetName] during tribal disunity:Horde_Collapse.1"
				free_vassal = SYU
				log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:released [SYU.GetName] during tribal disunity:Horde_Collapse.1"
				define_ruler = { 
					culture = mongolic_turk
					ADM = 1
					DIP = 1
					MIL = 1
					claim = 30
				}
				kill_heir = { }
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_subject = no
							is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						}
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					tag = OSS
				}
				PREV = { 
					create_subject = { 
						subject_type = close_tributary_state
						who = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:broke vassalage with [Root.GetName] during tribal disunity:Horde_Collapse.1"
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
				capital_scope = { 
					region = north_caucasus_region
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
			PREV = { 
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = close_tributary_state
					who = PREV
				}
			}
			log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:broke vassalage with [Root.GetName] during tribal disunity:Horde_Collapse.1"
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Horde_DisasterCD
				duration = 8000
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Horde_PuppetCD
				duration = 3650
			}
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
			set_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			add_horde_unity = -35
			add_prestige = -20
			define_heir = { 
				dynasty = ROOT
				culture = turco_mongol
				age = 20
				ADM = 1
				DIP = 1
				MIL = 1
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				add_local_autonomy = 5
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							culture = owner
						}
					}
					add_nationalism = 15
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 5
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
		hidden_effect = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atc
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -10
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = owner
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -10
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = ahf
				value = -600
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						stability = 3
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
					add_stability = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				which = ahf
			}
			divide_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 12
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 0.1
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 10
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = lsc
				value = 100
			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = lsc
				which = ahd
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = -2.5
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.2
	title = "Horde_Collapse.2.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.2.d"
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_heir = yes
		heir_age = 15
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 30
				}
				heir_claim = 75
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 50
				}
				heir_claim = 50
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 75
				}
				heir_claim = 25
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
		}
		has_regency = no
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		is_at_war = no
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.2.a"
		kill_heir = { }
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_horde_unity = -25
			log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:had Khan assasinated:Horde_Collapse.2"
		}
		add_prestige = -10
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -5
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -5
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-5
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.3
	title = "Horde_Collapse.3.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.3.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = Horde_PuppetCD
		}
		is_year = 1365
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.3.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:had Puppet Khan installed:Horde_Collapse.3"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = WHI
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1385
				}
			}
			define_ruler = { 
				name = "Mamai"
				dynasty = "Kiyat"
				culture = turco_mongol
				ADM = 3
				DIP = 2
				MIL = 5
			}
		}
		else = { 
			define_ruler = { 
				culture = turco_mongol
				ADM = 3
				DIP = 2
				MIL = 5
			}
		}
		define_ruler_to_general = { 
			fire = 4
			shock = 3
			manuever = 3
			siege = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			remove_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
			kill_heir = { }
			add_horde_unity = 50
		}
		add_prestige = 10
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 20
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 20
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_20
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.4
	title = "Horde_Collapse.4.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.4.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			has_regency = yes
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 60
			}
		}
		has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			}
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 30
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			}
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 40
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.4.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:one of cousins had Khan ousted and now is a ruler:Horde_Collapse.4"
		define_ruler = { 
			dynasty = ROOT
			culture = turco_mongol
			ADM = 1
			DIP = 2
			MIL = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_horde_unity = -50
			kill_heir = { }
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -5
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.5
	title = "Horde_Collapse.5.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.5.d"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Horde_DisasterCD
			}
			has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			is_subject_of = TIM
		}
		has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.5.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:pacified its tribes:Horde_Collapse.5"
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		capital_scope = { 
			add_local_autonomy = -50
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_10
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.6
	title = "Horde_Collapse.6.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.6.d"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.6.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:unified its tribes:Horde_Collapse.6"
		add_horde_unity = 10
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 20
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 20
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_20
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 3
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 15
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				clr_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			capital_scope = { 
				add_local_autonomy = -50
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			set_country_flag = Horde_Unifier
		}
	}
}

	id = Horde_Collapse.7
	title = "EVT_AI"
	desc = "EVT_AI"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = "EVT_AI"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Horde_Collapse.6
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_disaster_progress = { 
				disaster = Horde_Collapse
				value = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.10
	title = "Horde_Collapse.10.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.10.d"

	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}

					value = -2

			}

							is_colony = yes

						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}

						}
					}
				}

						which = ach
						value = -5

			}

					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Unifier
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
		}
	}

			}
		}

				}

			else = {

			}

		}

				is_emperor_of_china = yes

			add_mandate = 5

	}

country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.12
	title = "Horde_Collapse.12.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.12.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Horde_Unifier
		NOT = { 
			horde_unity = 75
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		is_lesser_in_union = no
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.12.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:Horde shattered on death of the unifier:Horde_Collapse.12"
		add_horde_unity = -50
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = yes
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = horde_collapse
				duration = 18250
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						stability = -2
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -5
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ach
						value = -5
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 3
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ach
						value = -5
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = yes
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
						development = 7
					}
				}
				random_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
						development = 7
					}
					spawn_rebels = { 
						type = pretender_rebels
						culture = turco_mongol
						size = 2
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ach
							value = -5
						}
						set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
				}
			}
			else = { 
				random_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
					}
					spawn_rebels = { 
						type = pretender_rebels
						culture = turco_mongol
						size = 2
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = ach
							value = -5
						}
						set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Unifier
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.13
	title = "Horde_Collapse.13.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.13.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		AND = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = hus
				value = 16
			}
		}
		has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.13.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:Great Khan rule ended the collapse:Horde_Collapse.13"
		add_horde_unity = 65
		hidden_effect = { 
			kill_heir = { }
		}
		add_prestige = 10
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 25
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 25
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_25
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			set_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.14
	title = "Horde_Collapse.14.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.14.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.14.a"
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:Great Khan died, pretender rose:Horde_Collapse.14"
		add_horde_unity = -30
		change_tag = GHO
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = pzs
				which = aaa
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = TradePost@PREV
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = POP_StartInit.012
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = SYS_Post.002
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:changed into [GHO.GetTag]:Horde_Collapse.14"
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -2
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-2
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				development = 7
			}
			spawn_rebels = { 
				type = pretender_rebels
				culture = turco_mongol
				size = 3
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -5
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			set_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.20
	title = horde_events.20.t
	desc = horde_events.20.d
	picture = KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = WHI
		has_ruler = "Jani Beg"
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1360
		}
		has_any_disaster = no
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 1
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.OHNO"
		kill_ruler = yes
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:Jani Beg died:horde_events.20"
		add_horde_unity = -50
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
			define_heir = { 
				name = "Qulpa"
				dynasty = ROOT
				culture = turco_mongol
				age = 18
				ADM = 1
				DIP = 1
				MIL = 1
			}
			add_horde_unity = -5
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			CHU = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 2
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 2
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 10
				}
				log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:country stabilised when Jani Beg of [Root.GetName] died:horde_events.20"
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atc
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 30
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = atg
							value = 30
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

							}

country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.100
	title = horde_events.100.t
	desc = horde_events.100.d
	picture = HORDE_ON_HORSEBACK_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		AND = { 
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					government = tribal
					OR = { 
						has_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
					}
					has_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					has_reform = Pol_Tradition4
				}
				AND = { 
					government = monarchy
					has_reform = Horde_MonarchyS
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			personal_union = 1
			personal_union_limited = 1
		}
		any_subject_country = { 
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
			junior_union_with = ROOT
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						government = tribal
						OR = { 
							has_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
						}
						has_reform = Pol_Leadership1
						has_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					}
					AND = { 
						government = monarchy
						has_reform = Horde_MonarchyS
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			NOT = { 
				years_in_union_under = { 
					who = ROOT
					years = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = horde_events.100.a
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
				junior_union_with = ROOT
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							government = tribal
							OR = { 
								has_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
							}
							has_reform = Pol_Leadership1
							has_reform = Pol_Tradition4
						}
						AND = { 
							government = monarchy
							has_reform = Horde_MonarchyS
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					years_in_union_under = { 
						who = ROOT
						years = 5
					}
				}
			}
			log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:broke union with [Root.GetName] on their ruler death:horde_events.100"
			break_union = ROOT
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			CHU = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							num_of_cities = 1
							NOT = { 
								tag = AAA
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = under_WHI_PU
						NOT = { 
							is_lesser_in_union = yes
						}
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = flavor_chu.4
					}
					clr_country_flag = under_WHI_PU
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = JAI
					tag = MUZ
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = horde_events.100.b
		custom_tooltip = horde_PU_war
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_subject_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					junior_union_with = ROOT
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								government = tribal
								OR = { 
									has_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
								}
								has_reform = Pol_Leadership1
								has_reform = Pol_Tradition4
							}
							AND = { 
								government = monarchy
								has_reform = Horde_MonarchyS
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						years_in_union_under = { 
							who = ROOT
							years = 5
						}
					}
				}
				break_union = ROOT
				log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[This.GetName]:broke union with [Root.GetName] on their ruler death:horde_events.100"
				log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:declared war to restore control over [This.GetName]:horde_events.100"
				ROOT = { 
					declare_war_with_cb = { 
						who = PREV
						casus_belli = cb_nomadic_submission
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = WHI
					has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				tag = MGH
				is_year = 1365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.22
	title = horde_events.22.t
	desc = horde_events.22.d
	picture = BORDER_TENSION_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		is_at_war = yes
		is_nomad = yes
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = steppe_declined_tributary
		}
		is_in_war = { 
			war_score = 25
			attacker_leader = ROOT
			casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
		}
		any_known_country = { 
			is_in_war = { 
				defender_leader = THIS
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
			NOT = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 2
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 30
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 40
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 50
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "horde_events.22.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				is_in_war = { 
					attacker_leader = ROOT
					defender_leader = THIS
					casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = horde_events.23
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "horde_events.22.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
		add_war_exhaustion = 1
		add_prestige = 10
	}
}

					value = 0.5
				}
			}
		}

				subject_type = tributary_state

			}

				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

		name = "horde_events.23.b"

		}

		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.1
	title = flavor_chu.1.t
	desc = flavor_chu.1.d
	picture = PALAIS_MAZARIN_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		senior_union_with = CHU
	}
	option = { 
		name = EVT_AI
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CHU = { 
					is_at_war = yes
				}
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					offensive_war_with = CHU
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.2
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CHU = { 
					is_at_war = no
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = flavor_chu.3
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.2
	title = flavor_chu.2.t
	desc = flavor_chu.2.d
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = peace_with_CHU
		}
		offensive_war_with = CHU
		CHU = { 
			AND = { 
				is_subject = yes
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				}
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			tag = JAI
			tag = MUZ
			tag = WHI
			tag = ISF
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.2.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = ERE
					tag = JAI
					tag = WHI
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					tag = MUZ
					tag = ISF
				}
			}
			2225 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = CHU
					}
					cede_province = ROOT
					add_core = ROOT
					add_claim = FROM
				}
			}
			1313 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = CHU
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							controlled_by = ROOT
						}
						cede_province = ROOT
						add_core = ROOT
						add_core = FROM
						3079 = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									owned_by = CHU
								}
								cede_province = ROOT
								add_core = ROOT
								add_core = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					else = { 
						cede_province = SDB
						add_claim = SDB
						add_core = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		white_peace = CHU
		CHU = { 
			overlord = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.3
				}
			}
		}
		white_peace = FROM
	}
	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.2.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 75
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = MUZ
					tag = ISF
				}
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		set_country_flag = peace_with_CHU
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.3
	title = flavor_chu.3.t
	desc = flavor_chu.3.d
	picture = CONQUEST_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		senior_union_with = CHU
		NOT = { 
			tag = WHI
		}
		CHU = { 
			is_at_war = no
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.3.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = JAI
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = MUZ
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						exists = ISF
					}
					add_claim = ISF
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = MUZ
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = JAI
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						exists = ISF
					}
					add_claim = ISF
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = ISF
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = JAI
				add_claim = MUZ
			}
		}
		inherit = CHU
		hidden_effect = { 
			3079 = { 
				add_core = ISF
			}
			2225 = { 
				add_core = ISF
			}
			2227 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			1313 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			3078 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			412 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			1314 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			416 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			463 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			1321 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			1318 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			416 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			2219 = { 
				add_core = QAR
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					is_core = CHU
				}
				remove_core = CHU
			}
		}
	}
}

				limit = {

					log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:released [This.GetName]:flavor_chu.4"

					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}

				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.5
					days = 10
				}
			}

					id = flavor_chu.5
					days = 10
				}
			}

					exists = ISF

						is_at_war = no
					}
				}
				ISF = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = flavor_chu.5
						days = 10
					}
				}
			}
			kill_heir = { }
			define_ruler_to_general = { 
				fire = 2
				shock = 2
				manuever = 2
				siege = 1
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.21
	title = "flavor_ggk.21.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.21.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = CRI
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = crimea_region
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
		is_year = 1390
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK

				is_nomad = no
			}

			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = CRI
				}
			}
			CRI = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
			}
			add_core = CRI
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = crimean
			}
		}
		moldavia_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					culture = vlach
				}
				add_core = MOL
			}
		}
		north_moldavia_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					culture = vlach
				}
				add_core = MOL
			}
		}
		basarabia_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				add_claim = MOL
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[CRI.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.21"
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = CRI
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					area = moldavia_area
					area = basarabia_area
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = MOL
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CRI = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = CRI
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		CRI = { 
			add_casus_belli = { 
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_independence_war
				months = 12
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_independence_war
			}
		}
		MOL = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = fe_MOL.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[CRI.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.21"
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = CRI
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					area = moldavia_area
					area = basarabia_area
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = MOL
		}
		MOL = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = fe_MOL.1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		CRI = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 282
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 282
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbk
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbo
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbs
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbu
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbw
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bby
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bca
								value = 0
							}
						}
						add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khx
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khy
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khz
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kia
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = auy
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kid
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kie
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kif
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kig
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = lqy
								value = 4
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noh
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noi
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

							}
						}

							set_variable = { 
								which = nok
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nol
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nom

							}

							}

								which = nop

							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

							}

						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

							set_variable = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.31
	title = "flavor_ggk.31.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.31.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = AST
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			OR = { 
				province_id = 1309
				province_id = 1310
				province_id = 1293
			}
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
		is_year = 1390
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = AST
				}
			}
			AST = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		1309 = { 
			add_core = AST
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = nogai
					}
				}
				change_culture = astrakhani
			}
		}
		1293 = { 
			add_core = AST
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = nogai
					}
				}
				change_culture = astrakhani
			}
		}
		1310 = { 
			add_core = AST
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = nogai
					}
				}
				change_culture = astrakhani
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[AST.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.31"
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					province_id = 1309
					province_id = 1310
					province_id = 1293
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = AST
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AST = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = AST
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		AST = { 
			add_casus_belli = { 
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_independence_war
				months = 12
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_independence_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[AST.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.31"
		1309 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = AST
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					province_id = 1309
					province_id = 1310
					province_id = 1293
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = AST
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		AST = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1293
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1293
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1310
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1310
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbk
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbo
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbs
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbu
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbw
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bby
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bca
								value = 0
							}
						}
						add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khx
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khy
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khz
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kia
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = auy
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kid
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kie
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kif
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kig
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

							}

							}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.41
	title = "flavor_ggk.41.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.41.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = NOG
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			area = nogai_area
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
		is_year = 1390
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = NOG
				}
			}
			NOG = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		nogai_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				add_core = NOG
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						culture = tartar
					}
					change_culture = nogai
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[NOG.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.41"
		nogai_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = NOG
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOG = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = NOG
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		NOG = { 
			add_casus_belli = { 
				target = ROOT
				type = cb_independence_war
				months = 12
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_independence_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[NOG.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.41"
		nogai_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = NOG
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		NOG = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3287
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3287
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbg

							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbk

						hidden_effect = {

								which = bbo

							}

						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.51
	title = "flavor_ggk.51.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.51.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1400
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KZH
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = kazakh_region
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KZH
				}
			}
			KZH = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					region = kazakh_region
					area = syrdarya_area
					area = arys_area
					province_id = 477
				}
			}
			add_core = KZH
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = khazak
			}
		}
		5072 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
		2223 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
		3295 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[KZH.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.51"
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = KZH
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				KZH = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = KZH
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		KZH = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					type = cb_independence_war
					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[KZH.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.51"
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = KZH
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		KZH = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3298
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3298
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3296
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3296
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3312
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3312
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3287
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3287
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.61
	title = "flavor_ggk.61.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.61.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = SHY
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = amodarya_region
			NOT = { 
				area = khiva_area
			}
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
		NOT = { 
			any_known_country = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
			}
		}
		is_year = 1410
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = SHY
				}
			}
			SHY = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		amodarya_region = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					area = khiva_area
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = balkh_area
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = vaxsh_area
				}
			}
			add_core = SHY
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
		syrdarya_region = { 
			limit = { 
				culture = chaghatai
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
		tashkent_area = { 
			add_core = SHY
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
