			change_culture = uzbehk
		}
		khiva_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[SHY.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.61"
		amodarya_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = khiva_area
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SHY
		}
		tashkent_area = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SHY
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				SHY = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = SHY
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		SHY = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					type = cb_independence_war
					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[SHY.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.61"
		amodarya_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = khiva_area
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SHY
		}
		tashkent_area = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SHY
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		SHY = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 457
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 457
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 436
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 436
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 454
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 454
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3296
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3296
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3298
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 3298
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.71
	title = "flavor_ggk.71.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.71.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KHI
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			area = khiva_area
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
		NOT = { 
			any_known_country = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
			}
		}
		is_year = 1405
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KHI
				}
			}
			KHI = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		khiva_area = { 
			add_core = KHI
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[KHI.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.71"
		khiva_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = KHI
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				KHI = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = KHI
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}

					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = {

					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT

				}
			}
		}
	}

								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = lqy
								value = 4
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = lqz
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noh
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noi
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noj
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nok
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nol
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nom
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = non
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noo
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nop
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nor
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = not
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noy
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = {

					}

			}
		}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.81
	title = "flavor_ggk.81.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.81.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KAZ
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			culture = kazani
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			is_year = 1400
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KAZ
				}
			}
			KAZ = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		4016 = { 
			add_core = KAZ
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}
		1308 = { 
			add_core = KAZ
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}
		1296 = { 
			add_core = KAZ
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				tag = WHI
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[KAZ.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.81"
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = kazani
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = KAZ
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				KAZ = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = KAZ
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		KAZ = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					type = cb_independence_war
					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[KAZ.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.81"
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = kazani
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = KAZ
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		KAZ = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1307
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1307
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1311
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1311
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbk
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbo
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbs
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbu
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbw
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bby
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bca
								value = 0
							}
						}
						add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
						add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khx
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khy
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = khz
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kia
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = auy
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kid
								value = 3
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kie
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kif
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kig

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.91
	title = "flavor_ggk.91.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.91.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = SIB
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 50
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			OR = { 
				area = iskier_area
				area = yrtesh_area
			}
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = SIB
				}
			}
			SIB = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
			}
			add_core = SIB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = siberian
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					culture = siberian
				}
				add_core = SIB
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[SIB.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.91"
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
		}
		4204 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = SIB
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = siberian
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				SIB = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = SIB
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		SIB = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					type = cb_independence_war
					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[SIB.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.91"
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
		}
		4204 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = SIB
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = siberian
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		SIB = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				define_ruler = { 
					name = "Abu'l Khayr"
					dynasty = "Shaybanid"
					culture = siberian
					ADM = 3
					DIP = 4
					MIL = 5
					claim = 90
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1079
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1079
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 2446
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 2446
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.101
	title = "flavor_ggk.101.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.101.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = BSH
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 1
			culture = bashkir
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = abb
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_lesser_in_union = yes
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = BSH
				}
			}
			BSH = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		2438 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
		1082 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
		1080 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				tag = WHI
			}
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[BSH.GetName] broke free, war started:flavor_ggk.101"
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = bashkir
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = BSH
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				BSH = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = BSH
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		BSH = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_casus_belli = { 
					target = ROOT
					type = cb_independence_war
					months = 12
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
		}
		log = "FE-Steppe:[GetYear]:[Root.GetName]:[BSH.GetName] broke free, no war:flavor_ggk.101"
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				culture = bashkir
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = BSH
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		BSH = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 2438
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 2438
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1082
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
						set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
					}
					set_capital = 1082
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbk
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbo
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {

country_event = { 
	id = horde_mechanic_events.1
	title = horde_mechanic_events.1.t
	desc = horde_mechanic_events.1.d
	picture = PALAIS_MAZARIN_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
			has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
		}
	}
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = horde_mechanic_events.1.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						dynasty = "Qublaid"
						dynasty = "Ariq-Bkid"
						dynasty = "Chagatayid"
						dynasty = "Dayanid"
						dynasty = "gedeid"
						dynasty = "Toluid"
						dynasty = "Jochid"
						dynasty = "Shaybanid"
						dynasty = "Geray"
						dynasty = "Edigid"
						dynasty = "Janid"
						dynasty = "Qasarid"
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = genghis_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							dynasty = "Qublaid"
							dynasty = "Ariq-Bkid"
							dynasty = "Chagatayid"
							dynasty = "Dayanid"
							dynasty = "gedeid"
							dynasty = "Toluid"
							dynasty = "Jochid"
							dynasty = "Shaybanid"
							dynasty = "Geray"
							dynasty = "Edigid"
							dynasty = "Janid"
							dynasty = "Qasarid"
						}
					}
				}
			}
			remove_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						dynasty = "Qublaid"
						dynasty = "Ariq-Bkid"
						dynasty = "Chagatayid"
						dynasty = "Dayanid"
						dynasty = "gedeid"
						dynasty = "Toluid"
						dynasty = "Jochid"
						dynasty = "Shaybanid"
						dynasty = "Geray"
						dynasty = "Edigid"
						dynasty = "Janid"
						dynasty = "Qasarid"
					}
				}
			}
			remove_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = genghis_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.1
	title = timur.1.t
	desc = timur.1.d
	picture = KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		dynasty = "Qara'unas"
		has_any_disaster = no
		is_year = 1358
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 1
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.1.a"
		kill_ruler = yes
		add_horde_unity = -50
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -15
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -15
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-15
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -300
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract25
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -1
				}
			}
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 1200
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ahf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = timur.2
						days = 180
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = timur.2
						days = 365
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = timur.2
						days = 250
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.2
	title = timur.2.t
	desc = timur.2.d
	picture = HORDE_ON_HORSEBACK_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		dynasty = "Qara'unas"
		has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.2.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
			set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
		}
		set_capital = 457
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							area = transoxiana_area
							region = syrdarya_region
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -10
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						region = syrdarya_region
						area = transoxiana_area
					}
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = 5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_5
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.3
				days = 50
			}
		}
		add_prestige = 40
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.2.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}

			every_owned_province = {

			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ahd

			}

				which = ahd

			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = lsc

			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = lsc
				which = ahd
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_StabAdd25
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 1
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.3
	title = timur.3.t
	desc = timur.3.d
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		dynasty = "Qara'unas"
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.3.a"
		kill_ruler = yes
		define_ruler = { 
			name = "Bayan"
			dynasty = "Suldus"
			culture = turco_mongol
			ADM = 1
			DIP = 1
			MIL = 1
			claim = 80
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -15
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -15
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf

					}
				}

								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.4
	title = timur.4.t
	desc = timur.4.d
	picture = MONGOL_BANNERS_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = MGH
		is_year = 1360
		is_at_war = no
		dynasty = "Chagatayid"
		CHG = { 
			has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 1
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.4.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 80
		}
		add_prestige = 25
		declare_war_with_cb = { 
			who = CHG
			casus_belli = cb_nomadic_submission
		}
		CHG = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.5
				days = 10
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			CHG = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Horde_TimurDead
						}
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = timur.6
						days = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.4.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -25
		add_horde_unity = 25
		hidden_effect = { 
			white_peace = CHG
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.5
	title = timur.5.t
	desc = timur.5.d
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "timur.5.a"
		add_horde_unity = -25
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				development = 7
				culture_group = tartar_group
			}
			spawn_rebels = { 
				type = pretender_rebels
				culture = turco_mongol
				size = 2
			}
		}
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				development = 7
				culture_group = persian_group
			}
			spawn_rebels = { 
				type = pretender_rebels
				culture = turco_mongol
				size = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.7
	title = timur.7.t
	desc = timur.7.d
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		NOT = { 
			war_score = -25
		}
		war_with = MGH
		has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 2
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.7.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
		}
		add_prestige = 25
		MGH = { 
			white_peace = CHG
			hidden_effect = { 
				CHG = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = hro
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = CHG
				subject_type = daimyo_vassal
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				is_core = MGH
			}
			cede_province = MGH
			remove_core = CHG
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					region = syrdarya_region
					area = transoxiana_area
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -15
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -15
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-15
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Horde_PuppetCD
				duration = 365
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.7.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		add_horde_unity = -25
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						area = transoxiana_area
						region = syrdarya_region
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -15
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -15
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-15
		}
	}
	after = { 
		MGH = { 
			kill_leader = { 
				type = "Timur Barlas"
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.8
	title = timur.8.t
	desc = timur.8.d
	picture = KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = MGH
		is_year = 1365
		ai = yes
		OR = { 
			overlord_of = CHG
			overlord_of = TIM
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 24
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 70
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 60
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 20
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.6.a"
		CHG = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = yes
					is_subject_of = PREV
				}
				grant_independence = yes
				add_truce_with = CHG
				CHG = { 
					add_truce_with = PREV
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.43
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		TIM = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = yes
					is_subject_of = PREV
				}
				grant_independence = yes
				add_truce_with = TIM
				TIM = { 
					add_truce_with = PREV
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.43
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		kill_ruler = yes
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.9
	title = timur.9.t
	desc = timur.9.d
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		AND = { 
			OR = { 
				is_subject = no
				is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
			}
		}
		is_year = 1365
		has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_TimurDead
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = Horde_PuppetCD
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 12
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 20
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.9.a"
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 5154
					}
				}
				development = 7
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1368
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = timur_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					size = 7
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1367
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = timur_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					size = 6
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1366
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = timur_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					size = 5
				}
			}
			else = { 
				spawn_rebels = { 
					type = timur_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					size = 4
				}
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = Horde_PuppetCD
			duration = 365
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.11
	title = timur.11.t
	desc = timur.11.d
	picture = RELIGION_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
		has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 36
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.11.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		remove_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
		add_ruler_modifier = { 
			name = timurid_khanate
			duration = -1
		}
		add_manpower = 20
		add_horde_unity = 25
		add_prestige = 50
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		define_consort = { 
			name = "Saray"
			dynasty = "Mulk-Khanum"
			culture = mongol
			religion = sunni
			adm = 4
			dip = 6
			mil = 3
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 30
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 30
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_30
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.11.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.12
	title = timur.12.t
	desc = timur.12.d
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = CHG
		AND = { 
			OR = { 
				is_subject = no
				is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_TimurDead
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler = "Timur Barlas"
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			dynasty = "Timurid"
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.12.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		set_country_flag = Horde_TimurDead
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.12.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.14
	title = timur.14.t
	desc = timur.14.d
	picture = KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = MGH
		ai = no
		OR = { 
			overlord_of = CHG
			overlord_of = TIM
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.14.a"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = TIM
			}
			TIM = { 
				grant_independence = yes
			}
		}
		else = { 
			CHG = { 
				grant_independence = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.14.b"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = TIM
			}
			TIM = { 
				grant_independence = yes
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							war_with = MGH
						}
					}
					declare_war_with_cb = { 
						who = MGH
						casus_belli = cb_independence_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			CHG = { 
				grant_independence = yes
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							war_with = MGH
						}
					}
					declare_war_with_cb = { 
						who = MGH
						casus_belli = cb_independence_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.15
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1368
		AND = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			}
		}
		has_country_flag = Timur_West
		ai = yes
		is_at_war = no
		any_neighbor_country = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
					culture_group = persian_group
					culture_group = georgian_group
					culture_group = armenian
					culture_group = oghuz
					culture_group = indus_group
					primary_culture = chaghatai
					tag = MGH
					tag = DLH
					tag = SYR
					tag = ILK
					primary_culture = alanian
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = KAT
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = BAL
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				alliance_with = PREV
			}
			OR = { 
				NOT = { 
					truce_with = PREV
				}
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
					ai = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				guaranteed_by = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				overlord_of = PREV
			}
			OR = { 
				is_subject = no
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_subject = no
							is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						}
					}
					ai = yes
				}
				overlord = { 
					NOT = { 
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
							NOT = { 
								has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
				AND = { 
					tag = DLH
					PREV = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = TIM_DLH
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					tag = MGH
					PREV = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = TIM_MGH
						}
					}
				}
				tag = KRS
				tag = HAZ
			}
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 12
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}

			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}

			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}

			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			prestige = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = CHU
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = CHU
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = CHU
					}
				}
				CHU = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						NOT = { 
							truce_with = PREV
						}
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			CHU = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = CHU
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_reconquest
			}
		}

									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			HAZ = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = HAZ
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_reconquest
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = TEH
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = TEH
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = TEH
					}
				}
				TEH = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						NOT = { 
							truce_with = PREV
						}
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			TEH = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = TEH
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_reconquest
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = TAB
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = TAB
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = TAB
					}
				}
				TAB = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						NOT = { 
							truce_with = PREV
						}
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			TAB = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = TAB
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_reconquest
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = ISF
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = ISF
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = ISF
					}
				}
				ISF = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						NOT = { 
							truce_with = PREV
						}
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			ISF = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = ISF
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_reconquest
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = DLH
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = DLH
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = DLH
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = TIM_DLH
				}
				DLH = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DLH = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = TIM_DLH
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = DLH
				casus_belli = cb_nomadic_tribute
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_neighbor_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							culture_group = persian_group
							culture_group = georgian_group
							culture_group = armenian
							culture_group = oghuz
							culture_group = indus_group
							primary_culture = chaghatai
							tag = MGH
							tag = DLH
							tag = SYR
							tag = ILK
							primary_culture = alanian
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = KAT
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = BAL
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						NOT = { 
							truce_with = PREV
						}
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						AND = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
						AND = { 
							tag = DLH
							PREV = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = TIM_DLH
								}
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							tag = MGH
							PREV = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = TIM_MGH
								}
							}
						}
						tag = KRS
						tag = HAZ
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
				PREV = { 
					declare_war_with_cb = { 
						who = PREV
						casus_belli = cb_nomadic_conquest_mil
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.16
	title = timur.16.t
	desc = timur.16.d
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes
	immediate = { }
	option = { 
		name = "timur.16.a"
		define_ruler = { 
			name = "Shah Rukh"
			dynasty = "Timurid"
			culture = turco_mongol
			religion = sunni
			age = 25
			male = yes
			adm = 4
			dip = 3
			mil = 5
			claim = 95
		}
		define_ruler_to_general = { 
			fire = 2
			shock = 4
			manuever = 3
			siege = 1
		}
		clear_scripted_personalities = yes
		add_ruler_personality = scholar_personality
		add_ruler_personality = architectural_visionary_personality
		add_ruler_personality = benevolent_personality
		define_consort = { 
			name = "Goharshad"
			age = 35
			dynasty = "Tarkhan"
			culture = persian
			adm = 4
			dip = 5
			mil = 3
		}
		add_ruler_modifier = { 
			name = shahrukhs_empire
		}
		country_event = { 
			id = timur.22
			days = 90
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = hus
						value = 15
					}
				}
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atc
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -15
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -15
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-15
			add_prestige = -20
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -5
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -25
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							NOT = { 
								province_group = steppes_group
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									continent = central_asia
								}
								NOT = { 
									region = crimea_region
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = iran_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = sistan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = khorasani_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = fars_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = hindusthan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = punjab_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = upper_doab_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = lower_mesopotamia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = upper_mesopotamia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_caucasus_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = west_anatolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = north_anatolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_anatolia_region
						}
					}
					add_nationalism = 40
				}
			}
			every_subject_country = { 
				limit = { 
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				}
				grant_independence = yes
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 10
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Miran Shah Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 4
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Khalil Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 4
				}

				}
			}

				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = {

					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 6
				}
			}

				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atc
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -20
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -20
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atf
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-20
			add_horde_unity = -25
			add_prestige = -25
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -4
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -4
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -20
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							NOT = { 
								province_group = steppes_group
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									continent = central_asia
								}
								NOT = { 
									region = crimea_region
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = iran_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = sistan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = khorasani_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = fars_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = hindusthan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = punjab_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = upper_doab_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = lower_mesopotamia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = upper_mesopotamia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_caucasus_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = west_anatolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = north_anatolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_anatolia_region
						}
					}
					add_nationalism = 20
				}
			}
			every_subject_country = { 
				limit = { 
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				}
				grant_independence = yes
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Sultan Husayn Tayichiud"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Miran Shah Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Khalil Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Pir Muhammad Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.17
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		AND = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_year = 1400
			}
			set_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			add_government_reform = Horde_Monarchy
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.16
					days = 30
				}
			}
			else = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.16
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dying
				}
			}

				limit = { 
					is_year = 1406
