					name = "Timur"
					dynasty = "Timurid"
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					age = 27
					male = yes
					ADM = 6
					DIP = 6
					MIL = 6
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1362
				}
				define_ruler = { 
					name = "Timur"
					dynasty = "Timurid"
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					age = 26
					male = yes
					ADM = 6
					DIP = 6
					MIL = 6
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_year = 1361
				}
				define_ruler = { 
					name = "Timur"
					dynasty = "Timurid"
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					age = 25
					male = yes
					ADM = 6
					DIP = 6
					MIL = 6
				}
			}
			else = { 
				define_ruler = { 
					name = "Timur"
					dynasty = "Timurid"
					culture = turco_mongol
					religion = sunni
					age = 24
					male = yes
					ADM = 6
					DIP = 6
					MIL = 6
				}
			}
			define_ruler_to_general = { 
				fire = 6
				shock = 6
				manuever = 6
				siege = 5
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.13
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
					}
				}
				add_ruler_modifier = { 
					name = timurid_khanate
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = Timur_Rise
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = Timur_Dying
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.18
	title = timur.18.t
	desc = timur.18.d
	picture = HORDE_ON_HORSEBACK_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
		OR = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = Cores_on_Ilkhanate_Region
				value = 40
			}
			culture_group = persian_group
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
						}
					}
				}
				capital_scope = { 
					superregion = persia_superregion
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Persianate
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 48
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.18.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 60
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = Timur_West
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Timur_Persianate
		change_government = monarchy
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Persianate
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asn
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = asq
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = asr
						value = 5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asq
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = asq
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asq
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = asq
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_NOLoyProv_5
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ass
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = asv
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = asw
						value = 5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asv
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = asv
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asv
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = asv
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_BGLoyProv_5
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atb
						value = 5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ata
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_5
			change_technology_group = muslim
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bba
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbc
					value = -1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbe
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbg
					value = 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbi
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbo
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbq
					value = -1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbs
					value = -1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bbu
					value = 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bby
					value = 0
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = bca
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Succession5
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = old_turkic
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Family4
			}
			else = { 
				add_government_reform = Pol_Family3
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
			add_government_reform = Pol_Assembly1
			add_government_reform = Pol_Structure4
			add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation2
			add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
			add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
			add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				add_local_autonomy = -10
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
			}
			add_government_reform = Horde_MonarchyS
		}
		else = { 
			add_government_reform = Horde_Monarchy
		}
		add_horde_unity = 50
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.18.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 40
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = Timur_East
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Persianate
		}
		add_horde_unity = 25
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 20
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 20
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_20
	}
	after = { 
		add_horde_unity = 25
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_country_flag = AITax_Yearly
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.19
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1375
		AND = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			}
		}
		has_country_flag = Timur_West
		ai = yes
		is_at_war = no
		NOT = { 
			any_known_country = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
					AND = { 
						tag = DLH
						PREV = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_flag = TIM_DLH
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		any_known_country = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
					culture_group = persian_group
					culture_group = georgian_group
					culture_group = armenian
					culture_group = oghuz
					culture_group = indus_group
					primary_culture = chaghatai
					tag = MGH
					tag = DLH
					tag = SYR
					tag = ILK
					primary_culture = alanian
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = KAT
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = BAL
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				alliance_with = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				truce_with = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				guaranteed_by = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				overlord_of = PREV
			}
			any_neighbor_country = { 
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { 
					AND = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = { 
				is_subject = no
				overlord = { 
					NOT = { 
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
							NOT = { 
								has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 6
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_neighbor_country = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							culture_group = persian_group
							culture_group = georgian_group
							culture_group = armenian
							culture_group = oghuz
							culture_group = indus_group
							primary_culture = chaghatai
							tag = MGH
							tag = DLH
							tag = SYR
							tag = ILK
							primary_culture = alanian
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = KAT
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = BAL
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = georgian_group
						culture_group = alanian_group
					}
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					any_neighbor_country = { 
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = { 
							AND = { 
								has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							culture_group = persian_group
							culture_group = georgian_group

							culture_group = oghuz
							culture_group = indus_group
							primary_culture = chaghatai

							tag = ILK
							primary_culture = alanian

							tag = KAT
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = BAL
						}
					}

						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = georgian_group
						culture_group = alanian_group
					}
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					any_neighbor_country = { 
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = { 
							AND = { 
								has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
								}
							}

					}

		}
		else_if = {

							culture_group = oghuz

							tag = MGH
							tag = DLH
							tag = SYR
							tag = ILK
							primary_culture = alanian
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = KAT
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = BAL
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = armenian
						primary_culture = turkoman
					}
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					any_neighbor_country = { 
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = { 
							AND = { 
								has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
								}
							}
						}
					}

						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							culture_group = persian_group
							culture_group = georgian_group

							culture_group = oghuz

						is_subject = yes
						overlord = { 
							AND = { 
								has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
								}
							}
						}

					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					any_neighbor_country = { 
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = { 
							AND = { 
								has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
								NOT = { 
									has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
				PREV = { 
					declare_war_with_cb = { 
						who = PREV
						casus_belli = cb_nomadic_tribute
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.20
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = AAA
		any_country = { 
			exists = yes
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		random_country = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = yes
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				every_subject_country = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							num_of_cities = 1
							NOT = { 
								tag = AAA
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
								culture_group = persian_group
								culture_group = georgian_group
								culture_group = armenian
								culture_group = oghuz
								culture_group = indus_group
								primary_culture = chaghatai
								tag = MGH
								tag = DLH
								tag = SYR
								tag = ILK
								primary_culture = alanian
							}
							NOT = { 
								tag = KAT
							}
							NOT = { 
								tag = BAL
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_subject = yes
							NOT = { 
								is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
							}
							NOT = { 
								is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
							}
						}
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							culture_group = indus_group
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = DLH
						}
					}
					PREV = { 
						inherit = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
						}
					}
					is_year = 1400
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_year = 1420
					}
					random_list = { 
						50 = { 
							country_event = { 
								id = timur.17
								days = 1
							}
						}
						50 = { }
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_year = 1410
					}
					random_list = { 
						25 = { 
							country_event = { 
								id = timur.17
								days = 1
							}
						}
						75 = { }
					}
				}
				else = { 
					random_list = { 
						15 = { 
							country_event = { 
								id = timur.17
								days = 1
							}
						}
						85 = { }
					}
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = Timur
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_West
				}
				every_neighbor_country = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							num_of_cities = 1
							NOT = { 
								tag = AAA
							}
						}
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							tag = SHI
							tag = KRS
							tag = HAZ
							tag = QAR
							tag = AKK
							tag = KHO
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_city = yes
									is_colony = yes
								}
								NOT = { 
									province_id = 5154
								}
							}
						}
						add_core = event_target:Timur
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = MUZ_Cleanup
				}
				NOT = { 
					exists = MUZ
				}

					has_global_flag = SDB_Cleanup
				}
				NOT = { 
					exists = SDB
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = SDB_Cleanup
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = SDB
				}
				remove_core = SDB
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = MIH_Cleanup
				}
				NOT = {

				}
			}
			set_global_flag = MIH_Cleanup
			every_province = {

					limit = { 
						culture = alanian
					}
					change_culture = tual
				}
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = alanian
				}
				change_culture = ossetian
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 4869
						}
					}
					add_core = OSS
				}
			}
			OSS = { 
				change_primary_culture = ossetian
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = MUL_Cleanup
				}
				OR = { 
					NOT = { 
						exists = MUL
					}
					MUL = { 
						is_subject_of = DLH
					}
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = MUL_Cleanup
			upper_doab_area = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			511 = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			3111 = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			3704 = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}

				remove_core = MUL
			}
			4595 = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			sistan_region = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			khorasani_region = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			3290 = { 
				remove_core = MUL
			}
			588 = { 
				add_core = MUL
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = YUA_Cleanup
				}
				NOT = { 
					exists = YUA
				}
			}
			YUA = { 
				set_global_flag = YUA_Cleanup
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
						is_core = YUA
					}
					remove_core = YUA
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
						culture = mongol
						NOT = { 
							region = inner_mongolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							OR = { 
								province_id = 3268
								province_id = 5131
								province_id = 2253
								area = ordos_area
							}
						}
					}
					add_core = KHA
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.21
	title = timur.21.t
	desc = timur.21.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		TIM = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
			ai = yes
			war_with = ROOT
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		}
		AND = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
				culture_group = persian_group
				culture_group = georgian_group
				culture_group = armenian
				culture_group = oghuz
				culture_group = indus_group
				primary_culture = chaghatai
				tag = MGH
				tag = DLH
				tag = SYR
				tag = ILK
				primary_culture = alanian
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = KAT
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = BAL
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = ORM
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = MGH
		}
		is_at_war = yes
		OR = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				controlled_by = TIM
			}
			TIM = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				war_score_against = { 
					who = ROOT
					value = 80
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = loa
				which = ani
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = loa
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.21.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					ai = no
					tag = DLH
					culture_group = indus_group
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = yes
					AND = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
						}
					}
				}
				white_peace = ROOT
				ROOT = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_subject = yes
						}
						grant_independence = yes
					}
				}
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = decentralized_vassal
					who = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = yes
					AND = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = Timur
				PREV = { 
					every_subject_country = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								num_of_cities = 1
								NOT = { 
									tag = AAA
								}
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								controlled_by = event_target:Timur
							}
							cede_province = event_target:Timur
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					white_peace = ROOT
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = ROOT
					}
					cede_province = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.21.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	after = { 
		set_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		random_country = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = yes
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
			}
			add_war_exhaustion = -1
			save_event_target_as = Timur
			every_neighbor_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
							culture_group = persian_group
							culture_group = georgian_group
							culture_group = armenian
							culture_group = oghuz
							culture_group = indus_group
							primary_culture = chaghatai
							tag = MGH
							tag = DLH
							tag = SYR
							tag = ILK
							primary_culture = alanian
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = KAT
						}
						NOT = { 
							tag = BAL
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}

					which = loa

				}

					limit = {

							}
						}
					}

						who = PREV

					}

						which = loa

					}

					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = loa
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = PREV
						modifier = aggressive_expansion
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = PREV
						modifier = aggressive_expansion
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = loa
						value = 2
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = loa
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_opinion = { 
						who = PREV
						modifier = aggressive_expansion
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = loa
						value = 1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = loa
					value = 0
				}
			}
			every_neighbor_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
					}
					add_core = event_target:Timur
				}
			}
		}
		AAA = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.20
				days = 1
			}
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = loa
			value = 0
		}
	}

	option = { 
		name = timur.22.a
		trigger = { 
			any_owned_province = { 
				OR = { 
					area = herat_area
					area = zahedan_area
					area = sistan_area
					area = baluchi_area
					area = quetta_area
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = China_ClaimForeign
			}

		}

			factor = 0.50
		}

					region = north_anatolia_region
					region = south_anatolia_region
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = China_ClaimForeign
			}
			is_emperor_of_china = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
		set_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owns = 2664
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				clr_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
				set_country_flag = changed_capital_by_event
			}
			set_capital = 2664
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					any_owned_province = { 
						continent = asia
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.60
					days = 1

country_event = { 
	id = timur.23
	title = timur.23.t
	desc = timur.23.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
		ai = yes
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Surrender
		}
		any_known_country = { 
			has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			}
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
			war_with = ROOT
			war_score_against = { 
				who = ROOT
				value = 80
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.23.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Surrender
		}
		random_country = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Successor
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				}
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
				war_with = ROOT
				war_score_against = { 
					who = ROOT
					value = 80
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				white_peace = ROOT
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = ROOT
				}
				add_core = PREV
				cede_province = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.23.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	after = { 
		set_country_flag = Ilkhanate_Surrender
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.24
	title = timur.24.t
	desc = timur.24.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 8
				has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
			}
			greece_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			west_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			north_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			south_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}
			}
			greece_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			west_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			north_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			south_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			greece_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			west_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			north_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			south_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}
		else = { 
			greece_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			west_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			north_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			south_anatolia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur_decentralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.80
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							exists = KAR
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = KAR
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = KAR
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = KAR
						}
						KAR = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}
					create_subject = { 
						subject_type = decentralized_vassal
						subject = KAR
					}
				}
				else = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = KAR
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = KAR
						}
					}

					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							exists = MNT
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = MNT
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = MNT
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = MNT
						}
						MNT = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}
					create_subject = {

						subject = MNT
					}

							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = POP_Init
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}
				}
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = decentralized_vassal
					subject = TKE
				}
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = TKE
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = TKE
					}
				}

						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = VEN
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						exists = NAX
					}
					any_owned_province = { 
						is_core = NAX
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = NAX
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = NAX
				}
				NAX = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = POP_Init
					country_event = { 
						id = Init.2
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = NAX
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = NAX
					}
				}
			}
		}

	option = { 
		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KAR
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KAR
				}

				limit = { 
					is_core = KAR
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV

			}

					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}

						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0

								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = TUR
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = TUR
				}
			}
		}

		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = KAR
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							region = west_anatolia_region
							region = north_anatolia_region
							region = south_anatolia_region
						}
						any_neighbor_province = { 
							owned_by = KAR
						}
					}
					cede_province = KAR
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = OTT
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							region = greece_region
							region = west_anatolia_region
							region = north_anatolia_region
							region = south_anatolia_region
						}
					}
					cede_province = OTT
				}
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				capital_scope = { 
					OR = { 
						region = greece_region
						region = west_anatolia_region
						region = north_anatolia_region
						region = south_anatolia_region
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.25
	title = timur.25.t
	desc = timur.25.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
			}
			south_caucasus_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			upper_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = diyar_rabia_area
						area = diyar_mudar_area
						region = syria_region
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}
			}
			south_caucasus_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			upper_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = diyar_rabia_area
						area = diyar_mudar_area
						region = syria_region
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			south_caucasus_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			upper_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = diyar_rabia_area
						area = diyar_mudar_area
						region = syria_region
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}
		else = { 
			south_caucasus_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			upper_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = diyar_rabia_area

			}
		}

					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia

					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							exists = HSN
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = HSN
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = HSN
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = HSN
						}
						HSN = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}

								}

								}

										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = {

										}

		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}

					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}

				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}

				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia

		}

						}

						region = upper_mesopotamia_region

						is_core = AKK
					}
				}

		1316 = { 
			add_core = SYU
		}
		AKK = { 
			add_historical_rival = TIM
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.26
	title = timur.26.t
	desc = timur.26.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
			}
			lower_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			diyar_rabia_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			diyar_mudar_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			syria_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}
			}
			lower_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			diyar_rabia_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			diyar_mudar_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			syria_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
			}
			lower_mesopotamia_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			diyar_rabia_area = { 
				limit = {

				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}

									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}
					create_subject = { 
						subject_type = decentralized_vassal
						subject = IRQ
					}
				}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.27
	title = timur.27.t
	desc = timur.27.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
			}
			iran_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = east_tabarestan_area
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			fars_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
			}
			iran_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = east_tabarestan_area
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			fars_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
			}
			iran_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = east_tabarestan_area
					}
				}

			}

				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}

		}
		else = {

					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			fars_region = {

						}
					}

									which = export

							}

					}

				}
				else = {

							}

							add_claim = PREV

						NOT = { 
							exists = SAM
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = SAM
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = SAM
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = SAM
						}
						SAM = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}
					create_subject = { 
						subject_type = close_tributary_state
						subject = SAM
					}
				}
				else = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = {

							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}
					create_subject = { 
						subject_type = tributary_state
						subject = CHU
					}
				}
				else = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = CHU
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = CHU
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							exists = ISF
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = ISF
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = ISF
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = ISF

									which = export

						}
					}
					add_permanent_claim = MUZ
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.28
	title = timur.28.t
	desc = timur.28.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
			}
			nishapur_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			ahel_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			merv_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			herat_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			east_tabarestan_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
			}
			nishapur_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			ahel_area = {

						NOT = { 
							exists = MZA
						}

							is_core = MZA
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = MZA
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = MZA
						}
						MZA = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}

									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt

											}
										}
									}

										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}

									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init

							subject = SDB
						}

					else = {

		name = timur_release

					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}

				has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan

country_event = { 
	id = timur.29
	title = timur.29.t
	desc = timur.29.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = BAL
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = BAL
			}
			BAL = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = BAL
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = BAL
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
			}
			herat_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			merv_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			sistan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
			}
			herat_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			merv_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			sistan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
			}
			herat_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			merv_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			sistan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}
		else = { 
			herat_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			merv_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			sistan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur_decentralise
		ai_chance = {

			modifier = { 
				factor = 2

					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq

					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = {

						has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan

						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							every_owned_province = { 
								limit = {

								}
								remove_core = PREV
								add_claim = PREV
								cede_province = KTD
							}
							KTD = {

									set_variable = { 
										which = kdt

									}
									if = {

											AND = {

													which = kdt

												}
											}
										}
										capital_scope = { 
											owner = { 
												change_religion = PREV
											}
										}

							subject = KTD
						}

							every_owned_province = { 
								limit = { 
									is_core = KTD
								}

					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = MIH
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = MIH
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = BAL
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = BAL
			}
			BAL = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = BAL
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = BAL
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Iraq
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KTD
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KTD
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = KTD
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = KTD
			}
			KTD = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = {

					if = {

							}

				}

					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {

					limit = { 
						is_core = KTD
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KTD
				}
			}
		}

					limit = { 
						is_core = MIH
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = MIH
				}
			}
		}

				NOT = { 
					exists = BAL
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = BAL
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = BAL
			}
			BAL = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = {

									value = -1

						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}

					limit = { 
						is_core = BAL
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = BAL
				}
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				capital_scope = { 
					OR = { 
						area = herat_area
						area = merv_area
						region = sistan_region
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.30
	title = timur.30.t
	desc = timur.30.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
			}
			kabulistan_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			balkh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			vaxsh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
			}
			kabulistan_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			balkh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			vaxsh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
			}
			kabulistan_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			balkh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			vaxsh_area = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}

				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV

				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			balkh_area = {

	option = { 
		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KAB
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KAB
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = KAB
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = KAB
			}
			KAB = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = KAB
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KAB
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = DHE
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = DHE
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = DHE
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = DHE
			}
			DHE = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init

					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = DHE
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = DHE
				}
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				capital_scope = { 
					OR = { 
						area = kabulistan_area
						area = balkh_area
						area = vaxsh_area
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.31
	title = timur.31.t
	desc = timur.31.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
			}
			syrdarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			amodarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = balkh_area
					}
					NOT = { 
						area = vaxsh_area
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			syrdarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			amodarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = balkh_area
					}
					NOT = { 
						area = vaxsh_area
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
			}
			syrdarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			amodarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						area = balkh_area
					}
					NOT = { 
						area = vaxsh_area
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}
		else = { 
			syrdarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			amodarya_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV

						area = balkh_area

					NOT = {

										which = export
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											AND = { 
												is_variable_equal = { 
													which = kdt
													value = -1
												}
											}
										}
										capital_scope = { 
											owner = { 
												change_religion = PREV
											}
										}
										force_converted = yes
									}
									set_variable = { 
										which = kdt
										value = 0
									}
								}
								clr_country_flag = POP_Init
								country_event = { 
									id = Init.2
								}
							}
						}
						create_subject = { 
							subject_type = rebellious_decentralized_vassal
							subject = MGH
						}
					}
					else = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							every_owned_province = { 
								limit = { 
									is_core = MGH
								}

								cede_province = MGH
							}

							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = MGH
						}
						MGH = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
							clr_country_flag = POP_Init
							country_event = { 
								id = Init.2
							}
						}
					}

						hidden_effect = { 
							every_owned_province = { 
								limit = { 
									is_core = MGH
								}
								remove_core = PREV
								add_claim = PREV
								cede_province = MGH

										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = POP_Init
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}
				}
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = decentralized_vassal
					subject = KHO
				}
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = KHO
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = KHO
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						exists = MGH
					}
					any_owned_province = { 
						is_core = MGH
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = MGH
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = MGH
					}
					MGH = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = POP_Init
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}
				}
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = decentralized_vassal
					subject = MGH
				}
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = MGH
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = MGH
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = CHG
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = CHG
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = CHG
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = CHG
			}
			CHG = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = CHG
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = CHG
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KHO
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KHO
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = KHO
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = KHO
			}
			KHO = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}

			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = KHO
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KHO
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = MGH
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = MGH
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = MGH
				}
				remove_core = PREV

					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KAS
				}
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				capital_scope = { 
					OR = { 
						region = syrdarya_region
						region = amodarya_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						area = balkh_area
					}
					NOT = { 
						area = vaxsh_area
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.32
	title = timur.32.t
	desc = timur.32.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
			}
			hindusthan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			punjab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			upper_doab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
			kashmir_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
			}
			hindusthan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			punjab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			upper_doab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
			kashmir_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 20
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
			}
			hindusthan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			punjab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			upper_doab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
			kashmir_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 35
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hindusthan_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50
			}
			punjab_region = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
				add_nationalism = 50

			upper_doab_region = {

		}

	option = { 
		name = timur_decentralise

					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
				}
			}
			if = {

					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
				MUL = { 
					grant_independence = yes
				}
				DLH = { 
					grant_independence = yes
				}

					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							exists = SND
						}
						any_owned_province = { 
							is_core = SND
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								is_core = SND
							}
							remove_core = PREV
							add_claim = PREV
							cede_province = SND
						}
						SND = { 
							hidden_effect = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}

							is_core = MAW
						}
					}

						limit = { 
							is_core = MAW
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = MAW
					}
					MAW = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = POP_Init
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}

		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
				NOT = {

				}
				NOT = {

			}

				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Indus
			}
		}

				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = DLH
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = DLH
				}
			}
		}

				NOT = { 
					exists = GUG

				any_owned_province = {

				}

					is_core = GUG

						region = upper_doab_region

			}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.33
	title = timur.33.t
	desc = timur.33.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_centralise
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
			}
			steppes_group = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					NOT = { 
						region = south_caucasus_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = syrdarya_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = amodarya_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = khorasani_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = sistan_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = kashmir_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = iran_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						region = fars_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						continent = asia
					}
				}
				add_nationalism = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Herat
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
			}
			steppes_group = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV

					NOT = {

				}

			}
		}
		else_if = {

						every_owned_province = {

								}

										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}

										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV

									force_converted = yes

							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
						}
						clr_country_flag = POP_Init
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}
				}

								}

									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = -1
											}
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
									force_converted = yes
								}

									which = kdt

								}

				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0

					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = GLC
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = ROS
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = ROS
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = ROS
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = ROS
			}
			ROS = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
				country_event = {

				}

		}

					cede_province = GOL
				}
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = {

					province_group = steppes_group
					NOT = { 
						region = south_caucasus_region

					}
